data.title: Avril Lavigne Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Avril Lavigne with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Won a radio-station contest at age 13

The prize was a trip to Ottawa to perform a duet with Shania Twain

Signed a contract with Arista at age 16

Sang the theme song for 2004's The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie

Made film debut as the voice of Heather the Possum in the 2006 animated film Over the Hedge

Started a clothing line, Abbey Dawn, in 2008

Launched the Avril Lavigne Foundation in 2010

The foundation supports children's causes in partnership with leading charitable organizations
